title: errors compiling "catkin installation" - fatal error: sdf/Sensor.hh not found

content.raw:
I just pulled the newest version \(`hg pull `and `hg update urban_circuit`\) and tried to compile it \(`catkin_make install`\). I get errors that `sdf/Sensor.hh` cannot be found: 

`...`

`[ 76%] Building CXX object subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/ControllerPlugin.dir/src/ControllerPlugin.cc.o`  
`In file included from /home/wolfgang/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_ign/src/GameLogicPlugin.cc:30:0:`  
`/usr/include/ignition/gazebo2/ignition/gazebo/components/DepthCamera.hh:20:10: fatal error: sdf/Sensor.hh: Datei oder Verzeichnis nicht gefunden`  
`#include <sdf/Sensor.hh>`  
`^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`  
`compilation terminated.`  
`subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/GameLogicPlugin.dir/build.make:62: recipe for target 'subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/GameLogicPlugin.dir/src/GameLogicPlugin.cc.o' failed`  
`make[2]: *** [subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/GameLogicPlugin.dir/src/GameLogicPlugin.cc.o] Error 1`  
`CMakeFiles/Makefile2:3723: recipe for target 'subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/GameLogicPlugin.dir/all' failed`  
`make[1]: *** [subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/GameLogicPlugin.dir/all] Error 2`  
`make[1]: *** Auf noch nicht beendete Prozesse wird gewartet …`  
`In file included from /home/wolfgang/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_ign/include/subt_ign/ArtifactValidator.hh:23:0,`  
`from /home/wolfgang/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_ign/src/ArtifactValidator.cc:18:`  
`/usr/include/ignition/gazebo2/ignition/gazebo/System.hh:28:10: fatal error: sdf/Element.hh: Datei oder Verzeichnis nicht gefunden`  
`#include <sdf/Element.hh>`  
`^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`  
`compilation terminated.`  
`subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/ArtifactValidator.dir/build.make:62: recipe for target 'subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/ArtifactValidator.dir/src/ArtifactValidator.cc.o' failed`  
`make[2]: *** [subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/ArtifactValidator.dir/src/ArtifactValidator.cc.o] Error 1`  
`CMakeFiles/Makefile2:3602: recipe for target 'subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/ArtifactValidator.dir/all' failed`  
`make[1]: *** [subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/ArtifactValidator.dir/all] Error 2`  
`In file included from /home/wolfgang/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_ign/src/CommsBrokerPlugin.cc:25:0:`  
`/home/wolfgang/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_ign/include/subt_ign/CommsBrokerPlugin.hh:37:10: fatal error: sdf/sdf.hh: Datei oder Verzeichnis nicht gefunden`  
`#include <sdf/sdf.hh>`  
`^~~~~~~~~~~~`  
`compilation terminated.`  
`subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/CommsBrokerPlugin.dir/build.make:62: recipe for target 'subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/CommsBrokerPlugin.dir/src/CommsBrokerPlugin.cc.o' failed`  
`make[2]: *** [subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/CommsBrokerPlugin.dir/src/CommsBrokerPlugin.cc.o] Error 1`  
`CMakeFiles/Makefile2:3560: recipe for target 'subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/CommsBrokerPlugin.dir/all' failed`  
`make[1]: *** [subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/CommsBrokerPlugin.dir/all] Error 2`  
`In file included from /home/wolfgang/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_ign/src/ControllerPlugin.cc:22:0:`  
`/home/wolfgang/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_ign/include/subt_ign/ControllerPlugin.hh:26:10: fatal error: sdf/Element.hh: Datei oder Verzeichnis nicht gefunden`  
`#include <sdf/Element.hh>`  
`^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`  
`compilation terminated.`  
`subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/ControllerPlugin.dir/build.make:62: recipe for target 'subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/ControllerPlugin.dir/src/ControllerPlugin.cc.o' failed`  
`make[2]: *** [subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/ControllerPlugin.dir/src/ControllerPlugin.cc.o] Error 1`  
`CMakeFiles/Makefile2:3681: recipe for target 'subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/ControllerPlugin.dir/all' failed`  
`make[1]: *** [subt/subt_ign/CMakeFiles/ControllerPlugin.dir/all] Error 2`  
`Makefile:140: recipe for target 'all' failed`  
`make: *** [all] Error 2`  
`Invoking "make install -j4 -l4" failed`

…

‌

Background: I also installed last week `sdf_to_urdf_sdf8` as described in the Model Migration Guid. 

How can I solve this error?
